content: lightweight and lacy this beautiful pineapple pattern is perfect any time of the day wear it as a shawl or wrap it around your neck for scarf-like warmth two other versions also available lacy pineapple shawl is purple and is the main link lacy blues pineapple shawl 1 is blue pineapple lace shawl 2 is grey **free video tutorial** by marly bird https //youtu be/y0plaem5thi** lacy pineapple shawl and pineapple lace shawl are both 68 173 cm across and 34 86 cm in length at center lacy blues pineapple shawl is 58 147 cm across and 26 66 cm in length at center all three shawls are the same pattern the size of the shawl is changed based on the number of pattern repeats the chart includes the first repeat of row 7-9 10-12 so the chart reader can see the repeat begin on the same side of the pattern if following the chart after row 12 which would be two full row repeats begin row 7 again **gauge ** row 1-10 = 13 x 8½ 33 x 21 5 cm check your gauge use any size hook to obtain your gauge **errata row 4 should have double_crochet chain 3 instead of single_crochet ** *row 4 slip st in each of first 2 double_crochet and in first chain-2 space beg shell * chain 3 skip next chain-3 space **double_crochet** chain 3 5 times in next chain-3 space skip next chain-3 space shell in next chain-3 space repeat from * once more turn * 1 http //www redheart com/free-patterns/lacy-blues-pineapple-shawl 2 http //www redheart com/free-patterns/pineapple-lace-shawl
